name: SimuBloch
author: Tristan Glatard
description: This application wraps the MRI simulator SimuBloch developed at INRIA / IRISA / INSERM - VisAGeS Team. Detailed documentation is available <a href="http://vip.creatis.insa-lyon.fr/documentation/simubloch-guide.pdf">here</a>.

inputs.name: T1
inputs.description: the T1 map, passed to SimuBloch with option --t1

inputs.name: T2
inputs.description: the T2 map, passed to SimuBloch with option --t2

inputs.name: M0
inputs.description: the proton density map, passed to SimuBloch with option --m0

inputs.name: TR
inputs.description: the TR value, passed to SimuBloch with option -r

inputs.name: TE
inputs.description: the TE value, passed to SimuBloch with option -e
